Release 1.3.5 - 2011-11-28

TypeChangesBy

Use hostname "unknown" when InetAddress.getLocalHost fails.mhm

Replace backtick by $() launch script.mhm

Release 1.3.4 - 2011-09-23

TypeChangesBy

Properly escape special characters in the application's _OPTS variable name.mlhartme

Update Sushi 2.5.1 to 2.6.1.mlhartme

Release 1.3.3 - 2011-06-24

TypeChangesBy

Remove println in verify method().mlhartme

Print size of the generated application.mlhartme

Update Sushi 2.5.0 to 2.5.1.mlhartme

Release 1.3.2 - 2011-06-20

TypeChangesBy

Verify main parameter and report an error if the class does not exist of has no main method.mlhartme

Updating sushi 2.2.0 to 2.5.0 to get rid of "/" entry in the application file.mlhartme

Print size of the jar files added to the application.mlhartme

Reject configuration patterns with blanks.mlhartme

Release 1.3.1 - 2011-02-22

TypeChangesBy

Overwrite option now works for equal entries.mlhartme

Fix "empty path" exception.mlhartme

Release 1.3.0 - 2011-02-18

TypeChangesBy

Switch to Sushi 2.2.0.mlhartme

Change groupId and package to net.sf.beezle.maven.plugins. Bump minor version to reflect this incompatible change.mlhartme

TypeChangesBy

Remove attribute must not remove directories.mlhartme

Check at build time if the main class exists.mlhartme
